title: Update people through Zulip about open tickets in Zammad
author: Ghazi Triki
readme: Fetches Zammad tickets at daily basis at 08:30 then sends them to #customer support>ticket on zulip for daily standups.
readme_zh: 每日08:30获取Zammad工单，随后将其发送至Zulip的#客户支持>工单频道用于每日站会。
title_zh: 通过Zulip向人们更新Zammad中未处理的工单情况
